attributes.action: Encourage the teaching and use of Esperanto in all schools.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The teaching of Esperanto as a compulsory second language in all schools worldwide, would enable easier communication. Each country should maintain it's mother toungue, and teach Esperanto as the second language.

rejection.details: The UK Government cannot decide the curriculum of schools outside the UK.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
